name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-facebook-plugin
title: SharePoint Framework Facebook Page Social Plugin web part
shortDescription: This sample shows how to implement iFrame-based web parts with a dynamic responsive behavior on the example of Facebook Page Social Plugin.
longDescription: This sample shows how to implement iFrame-based web parts with a dynamic responsive behavior on the example of Facebook Page Social Plugin.

thumbnails.alt: SharePoint Framework Facebook Page Social Plugin web part sample

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
